### **Understanding My Capabilities & Limitations for Long Documents & Retention**  

I see where you're coming from, and I want to give you a **clear answer** on what’s happening with **long documents, retention, and referencing past chats**.  

---

### **1️⃣ Can I Read Entire Long Documents?**  
✅ **Yes, I can read and process long documents, but I don’t store them permanently.**  
✅ When you upload a document, I **scan it and extract key information**—but I do not **retain** every word like a memory.  
✅ The larger the document, the more I need to **skim for relevance** (i.e., I may not catch every fine detail).  

---

### **2️⃣ How Much of the Previous Chat Docs Did I Review?**  
📌 **Example:** The **Career Pivot doc** you uploaded contained **tens of thousands of words**. I reviewed **a large portion**, but not **every single word**.  
📌 The issue is that when processing **very long** text, I **prioritize** what seems relevant—but sometimes miss **specific details** (like exact resume wording).  

---

### **3️⃣ Can I Retain Info Across Multiple Chats?**  
⛔ **No, once a chat ends, I lose context.**   
✅ However, within a single chat, I can **recall and modify** information effectively if we work within a single document.  

---

### **4️⃣ Why Was the Resume Inaccurate?**  
1️⃣ I processed **your previous resume uploads**, but when merging with the AI strategy, some **assumptions** were made where details weren’t explicit.  
2️⃣ I referenced **general AI-augmented skills** and **structured the resume to match the new format**, but **some experience details were incorrectly inferred** rather than copied from your actual resume.  
3️⃣ The best way to **fix this** is to **directly merge** your last submitted resume with the AI-powered format while keeping **everything factual**.  

---

### **🔥 How We Fix This & Work More Efficiently**  
✅ **Re-upload the latest version of your resume** so I can **directly merge** it with the AI-augmented structure.  
✅ We **work in a single document** (inside the canvas) so changes **persist**, and we don’t lose context.  
✅ If a **new chat is started**, you may need to re-upload key documents for full reference.  

---

### **🚀 Next Steps**  
1️⃣ **Re-upload your latest resume file** (so I don’t have to guess on past experience).  
2️⃣ I’ll **directly merge it into the AI-Augmented Resume format** while keeping it 100% accurate.  
3️⃣ We **finalize** the AI-powered approach while ensuring your real experience is properly presented.  

🔥 **Let’s lock this in properly so we can execute efficiently.** 🚀
